BioDescription: Fokcio. A Minecraft gremlin. I code when the mood strikes me. Games? Rarely. But when I do, nicely.
PGDescription: Become a potato, build a world, complete the parkour, and don't get cooked
CADescription:
Cawagla is a fake computer virus written in Python that makes the user feel like their computer is freezing.
To exit, press ESC.
The application has been tested on Windows 11.
CDescription:
Catus is a fake computer virus written in Python,
plays music and shows CATS.
To exit, press ESC.
The application has been tested on Windows 11.
KaruzelaOpisPNR: Game created by AI, involves keeping the ball on the platform using buttons or keyboard arrows.
KaruzelaOpisPG: Become a potato, build a world, complete the parkour, and don't get cooked
KaruzelaOpisC:
Catus is a fake computer virus written in Python,
plays music and displays random CATS,
To exit, press ESC
The application has been tested on Windows 11
KaruzelaOpisCA:
Cawagla is a fake computer virus written in Python,
makes the user feel like their computer is freezing,
To exit, press ESC

KaruzelaOpisEM: <b>EMOJIMAGE<b> is a tool for transforming an image into one where instead of colors - there are <i>emoji<i>
KaruzelaOpisII: INFINITYIMAGE is a paint tool that zooms into infinity (I recommend zooming out a lot before drawing, because it breaks when zoomed in too much)
